title: Medieval/Baroque/Fantasy - Music Pack
description: Music Pack designed for medieval, baroque, fantasy, RPG, adventure, strategy, history or open world games.
longDescription:
This pack contains 85 files: full tracks, loops, variations, stingers and ambients;

appropriate for towns, exploration, emotions, characters and battles.


Listen here


All you need for interactive game music.
